name: CAT RPG (JJJ SOFTWARE LTD)
description:
JJJ SOFTWARE LTD PRESENTS... CAT RPG

Face cultists, as you try to defeat the cult of the Big bad from the ground up! a group of sphinx cats have begun their ritual to revive their old god, and has caused chaos across cat kind! it is up to YOU to defeat them!

Challenge yourself and your foes, as you fight to the death, And explore the temple from the ground up! The game is in your hands, and its up to you to strategize!

IMPORTANT: For Legal reasons, JJJ SOFTWARE LTD reminds you that the contents of the game may or may not be equal to the description.

JJJ SOFTWARE LTD IS A PART OF JJJ'n CO, ALONGSIDE JJJ MUSIC GROUP, AND JETTERSOFT.

We are a game development team interested in bringing you great games of any kind! Composed of many people, we try to make experiences that you can enjoy!

NOTE: This is my first rpg maker game, so there might be a ton of issues. i will try and fix any that is noticed or reported.
